message.body: I'm gonna stop by in an hour or so to get some stuff
Ok... so you need me home for that? Lol
No I was just warning you
Oh haha.. Want aware I needed a warning but ok
Yeah I haven't been there in so long. I think since I watched shadow
I don't feel right popping up
Lol im not dad, its perfectly fine to just pop up
Btw ive been meaning to ask you if you would be available next weekend 19th - 21st, maybe 22nd... to watch shadow again

Ok I mean we leave sat after work so really just need later on sat abd then come home monday probably night. So of course would need you to feed him and put him out. Then if you can sleep over so that he isn't in the cage at night
Just sleep over sat and sunday*
I didn't respond to you. I can do it. So come over Saturday night and stay overnight. Then go back and stay over Sunday night through Monday morning. Is that it?
Yea and just feeding and putting out in the yard
Of course if you able to linger during the day so he isn't locked up for 12 hours but you don't have to be over all day bec she is normally away while we are at work any way
Okay that's fine. I can stay during the day some too
